newsitem.title: USA: Alpharel signs marketing pact w/ McDonnell.
newsitem.headline: Alpharel signs marketing pact w/ McDonnell.

text.p: Alpharel Inc said Friday it has signed an agreement with McDonnell Information Systems Plc for McDonnell to market Alpharel's Enterprise Document Management solutions.
Alpharel said it has more than 30 other strategic partners marketing its document management software worldwide.
